title: Breaking News: Market Hits Record High
summary: Stock market reaches all-time high amid economic optimism.

title: Mass protests against Trump across US as president holds huge military parade
summary: Organisers said hundreds of demonstrations were held in a day of defiance to counter a huge military parade hosted by Trump.

title: Manhunt after two Minnesota state politicians targeted, one of them killed
summary: Hortman and her husband were killed and Hoffman and his wife injured in what officials called 'targeted political violence'.

title: The first trial of its kind: A Russian soldier takes the stand for an execution
summary: Dmitriy Kurashov is the first Russian soldier to stand trial in Ukraine over a battlefield execution.

title: Ex-Syrian commander claims missing US journalist Austin Tice was executed
summary: Major General Bassam Al Hassan claims former Syrian President Assad ordered Austin Tice's execution.

title: Wait for bodies deepens pain of families after Air India crash
summary: Officials said on Saturday that 11 victims had been identified so far based on their DNA
